issue.title: [CF 994] Unit Cooldown Timer Resetting
issue.body:
http://www.twitch.tv/jalopia/b/564693559?t=2h28m45s (no audio because lolcopyright, though shouldn't matter).
http://www.twitch.tv/jalopia/b/564693559?t=2h30m15s (stops, resets once or twice, then continues with cooldown).

Look at the mid-left of the screen, the Ring of Peace icon (between the dispel cooldown and paralyze cooldowns, above enrage/trinket auras)

http://pastebin.com/7ajB4hfS - Icon in question

http://pastebin.com/rRj9Fx7E - Icon's group (note, this is a global group for me)

For some reason, the unit cooldown timer gets reset after a few seconds after being cast. Has happened for me on a few other auras, all unit cooldown related. No clue what could be causing it.

Can't find any other instances of this happening, but I know they exist somewhere. I've had cases where my aura shows something on cooldown but my teammate says it's usable a fair amount of times.


> Posted by CurseForge user Jalopyy | Imported from CurseForge issue #994 | Raw

comments.body:
Happens because Ring of Peace gets "casted" every time it affects an enemy. Track it specifically by ID (116844) to fix this.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
